scripts.push: rm -rf ./angular/dist && rm -rf ./firebase-functions/lib && npm run format && git add . && git commit -m "$(date)" && git push
scripts.deploy:hosting: rm -rf ./angular/dist && cd ./angular && ng build && cd ../ && firebase deploy --only hosting && rm -rf ./angular/dist
scripts.emulate:functions: cd ./firebase-functions && rm -rf ./lib && tsc --outdir ./lib && cd ../ && firebase emulators:start --only functions && rm -rf ./firebase-functions/lib
